comments:

occurred in another thread. It could be us, or it could be a builder or any 
other delta listener.
I think that the load succeeded, but I'm not sure.

Marking as duplicate of bug 7894, Carolyn has some extra info in that PR. I'll 
try to find a reproducable case.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7894 ***
